personal.name: Manjeet Kumar
personal.title: Engineering Manager
subtitle: Engineering Manager
Technical Architect
Programmer
Full Stack Developer
ML & Data Science Enthusiast
personal.bio: Hello, I'm Manjeet, Engineering Manager based in Berlin, Germany. I have 14+ years of experience in Team Management, Team Building, Software Architecture Design, Database technology & Full-stack development. My experience has provided me with the innovative Management & Technical skills necessary to successfully provide an Organization with multifaceted technical solutions across a wide range of software platforms. Currently leading engineering at ContainerGrid, building AI-powered Circular Economy platforms using GenAI, LangChain, and modern cloud-native technologies.

skills.name: GenAI, LangChain, RAG, LLM Integration
skills.description: Building Agentic AI workflows, integrating multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini), implementing RAG pipelines and tool-calling agents for production systems.

skills.name: JAVA/J2EE
skills.description: Working on Java/J2ee technology since 2010. Expert in designing/coding multi tier & robust systems.

skills.name: Spring Framework
skills.description: Well versed in Spring Framework & its various flavours e.g. Spring boot, cloud & Microservices.

skills.name: Web Services
skills.description: Expert in Designing & Developing webservices using XML, XSD & REST API.

skills.name: Oracle & MySQL
skills.description: Well versed in writing CRUD queries, Views, Procedures & functions in Oracle & MySQL.

skills.name: AWS & GCP
skills.description: Experience with cloud infrastructure, deployment, and serverless architectures.

skills.name: Kubernetes, Docker & ArgoCD
skills.description: Container orchestration, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure as code.

skills.name: Kafka, Redis, Elasticsearch
skills.description: Experience with message queues, caching, and search infrastructure.

skills.name: HTML, CSS, JavaScript & jQuery
skills.description: Skilled in modern web development. Worked on open source projects using Node.js.

skills.name: React Native, Expo SDK
skills.description: Led migration to React Native 0.76+ and Expo SDK 52, modernizing mobile applications with improved stability and development velocity.

responsibilities: Leading engineering strategy for ContainerGrid's AI-powered Circular Economy platform, enabling intelligent waste management, sustainable material recovery, and end-to-end product lifecycle traceability
Owned end-to-end engineering strategy and platform architecture for AI-driven Circular Economy product, delivering GenAI-powered insights for operational and sustainability decisions
Architected next-generation Circular Take-Back platform enabling Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) and End-of-Life (EOL) recovery using event-driven microservices and API-first design
Designed and implemented Agentic AI workflows for Analytics, Routing optimization, and decision support using LangChain, RAG pipelines, and Tool-calling agents
Integrated multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini) with MCP-style routing layer to dynamically select models based on cost, latency, and task requirements
Combined predictive ML models with LLM-based reasoning layers to optimize Supply-chain Orchestration and Waste collection routing
Built AI/ML-powered Route optimization engine, improving Logistics Efficiency and Operational planning
Led modernization of legacy mobile applications, migrating to React Native (0.76+) and Expo SDK 52
achievements: Introduced AI-assisted development practices (GitHub Copilot, Claude Code), reducing feature delivery cycle time by ~40%
Implemented AI observability, Prompt versioning, Cost Monitoring, and Fallback strategies for reliable AI usage in production
Scaled Engineering organization from inception, defining ownership models, hiring plans, and growth paths
Reengineered Agile Delivery processes, improving sprint predictability and delivery velocity by 40%

responsibilities: Cross-Functional Team Leadership: Orchestrated and led cross-functional teams across the entire application lifecycle, from inception and design through development, rigorous testing, deployment, and ongoing maintenance
Strategic Architectural Decision-Making: Empowered team in making strategic architectural decisions to enhance scalability, performance, and security of applications
Stakeholder Collaboration: Fostered seamless collaboration with Business, Product Management, and Operations teams, delivering exceptional value resulting in substantial revenue growth
Team Development and Mentoring: Provided continuous feedback, coaching, and mentorship, fostering growth and excellence within the team
Microservice Environment Management: Managed high-load microservice environment with decoupled services and API communication handling large data sets
DevOps Enhancement: Led efforts to enhance DevOps stacks, implementing ODE concept that streamlined development & testing process
Documentation and Code Quality: Maintained rigorous documentation and high code quality standards across the team
Talent Acquisition: Recruited and retained highly talented team of professionals
achievements: Successfully developed & delivered Booking to Shipment conversion functionality
Led enhancement and rollout of Yangtze Project to Europe and Asia within 3 months of joining

responsibilities: Built Anti-Fraud solutions for Wallet and Payment applications in high-scale fintech environment
Designed and implemented cutting-edge applications transforming the delivery industry
Managed project priorities, deadlines and deliverables within autonomous teams
Led architectural decision making for microservices under high load with large data sets
Worked closely with Product Management to provide best value for stakeholders and customers
Led & mentored team of 6 Backend Engineers developing Risk & Fraud prevention solutions for Identity & Payment
Enhanced DevOps stacks to run immutable infrastructure with Kubernetes
Maintained clean, tested and well-documented code across the team
achievements: Built enterprise-level fraud detection system handling millions of transactions
